workout_groups.name: Breathing
workout_groups.description: Improve respiratory control, oxygen efficiency, and endurance through controlled breathing exercises.

workouts.name: Box Breathing
workouts.description: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, and hold again.

workouts.name: Wim Hof Method
workouts.description: Perform deep inhales and forceful exhales, followed by breath retention.

workouts.name: Diaphragmatic Breathing
workouts.description: Breathe deeply into the diaphragm to enhance oxygen intake and relaxation.

workouts.name: Breath Ladder Drill
workouts.description: Perform light physical activity while gradually reducing breaths per movement.

workouts.name: Nasal Breathing Endurance
workouts.description: Breathe exclusively through the nose during a sustained activity to improve efficiency.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Breathing Techniques
workout_groups.description: Master complex breathing methods to enhance endurance, mental resilience, and energy control.

workouts.name: Tummo Fire Breath
workouts.description: A Tibetan breathing technique that generates body heat through controlled hyperventilation and visualization.

workouts.name: Apnea Walk
workouts.description: Hold your breath while walking, gradually increasing distance to improve CO2 tolerance and lung capacity.

workouts.name: Double Nasal Lock
workouts.description: Breathe exclusively through alternate nostrils while performing controlled movement exercises.

workouts.name: Negative Exhale Training
workouts.description: Extend exhale duration past the inhale phase, conditioning breath control under stress.

workouts.name: Extreme Low-Oxygen Training
workouts.description: Train in hypoxic conditions (low oxygen) by reducing breath frequency while performing endurance drills.

workout_groups.name: Psi Breathing Techniques
workout_groups.description: Develop breath control beyond physiological limits, unlocking psi-energy flow and resonance harmonization.

workouts.name: Pranic Energy Breathwork
workouts.description: Inhale and direct pranic energy (life force) throughout your body using intent-driven breath cycles.

workouts.name: Hyper-Oxygenation Psi Shift
workouts.description: Sustain ultra-oxygenated states to induce altered consciousness and psi-state activation.

workouts.name: Zero Breath Suspension
workouts.description: Enter a breathless state where oxygen efficiency is maximized, sustaining psi-activation beyond conventional limits.

workouts.name: Psi Resonance Pulse Breathing
workouts.description: Use controlled vibrational breath pulses to synchronize brainwaves with external energies.

workouts.name: Etheric Breath Alignment
workouts.description: Breathe with your entire energetic field, aligning breath cycles with external etheric currents.
